basics.name: Lovejinder Singh
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Experienced Software Developer adept in all stages of advanced web development. Knowledgeable in user interface, testing, and debugging processes. Bringing forth expertise in design, installation, testing and maintenance of web systems. Proficient in an assortment of technologies, including Python, Django, Javascript, React and SQL. Able to effectively self-manage during independent projects, as well as collaborate in a team setting. Demonstrated an ability to quickly adapt to leadership roles and effectively manage projects from inception to completion. Ready to start a new adventure and surf through the challenges.

work.name: DMD Solutions
work.summary: Effectively led a skilled team of software developers, optimizing task allocation and tracking team activities to ensure alignment between individual ambitions and project objectives, resulting in enhanced project delivery and successful completion of key software initiatives
highlights: Mentored engineers through regular 1:1s and conducted biannual performance reviews.
Balanced technical full-stack responsibilities with team leadership duties (approximately 30% Team Lead - 70% Full Stack).
Led the product development of Robin RAMS, refining the product roadmap to align with market trends and customer needs.

As the Product Owner of the company’s internal ERP tool, spearheaded the development of features that integrated various departments, substantially enhancing cross-departmental workflows and reducing invoicing delays by 65%.
Served as Scrum Master, endorsing agile methodologies within the team and conducting approximately 25 sprints annually.
Drove strategic stakeholder meetings to align with corporate objectives.
Revolutionized system infrastructure by implementing high-availability solutions in AWS, achieving 99.9% system uptime.
Enhanced AWS EC2 deployment efficiency through automation and dockerization, reducing deployment times by 40%.
Implemented a pre-production environment with Bitbucket Pipelines, reducing by 60% the bugs reported in production after new deployments.
Strategically implemented cost-optimization initiatives in AWS infrastructure, achieving a significant 34% reduction in operational costs.

work.name: DMD Solutions
work.summary: Front-End & Back-End development of Tailored-made Softwares
highlights: Front-End & Back-End development of Robin RAMS in Django framework (Python, HTML, Javascript & CSS)
Maintenance Process Digitization Project for a Swiss Aerospace Company

Optimized both front-end and back-end code by applying advanced data structures and efficiency algorithms, significantly reducing loading time from 120 seconds to 6 seconds. This achievement was marked by a thorough analysis of computational complexity and strategic enhancements, showcasing a deep understanding of algorithmic optimization and system performance improvement.
Automations of the company's processes though the implementation of new modules in the companies' ERP tool.

work.name: Vueling Airlines S.A.
work.summary: Calculation of Performance tables for the airline's fleet: Take-off & Landing with PEP (Performance Engineer's Programs) and FlySmart (EFB)
highlights: Automations of daily tasks of the department using Excel Macros and python scripts

projects.name: Classpip
projects.description: Improved functionalities of a gamification tool: Implemented features for student trading card exchange and online exam system using Angular.

projects.name: PdM Algorithm
projects.description: Innovative project predicts aircraft defects, reducing maintenance costs and extending lifespan. Utilizes diverse machine learning models and data integration obtaining 65% accuracy.

projects.name: DineDash
projects.description: Restaurant management software with Express.js API backend and React frontend. Currently utilized in my family restaurant to centralize operations and eliminate the need for multiple spreadsheets.

projects.name: URL Shortener
projects.description: Created a URL shortener application using FastAPI to gain proficiency in the framework.

projects.name: DuoTasks
projects.description: Developed the backend of DuoTasks, an app designed for task assignment between couples. Implemented GraphQL to facilitate efficient data querying and management.

projects.name: Clash of Quiz
projects.description: Currently developing an app like Kahoot. Incorporating AI-generated questions and live answering using WebSockets. Working on a microservice for ML model to generate questions based on specific topics.
